g.text: setup jwt endpoint for oidc_discovery with secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
create Policy "sman-<CIID>-policy" with access to kv-sman-<CIID>
create login Role "sman-<CIID>-role" for authenticating with JWT based on configured POD-Selector having "sman-<CIID>-policy" permissions
create & inject SideCar container with JWT mount, Canvas-Vault-URL, role-name and KV-Store name<CIID>
Initialization - one-time negotiation about a token securing the localhost communication
